entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
